name: Raspberry Sauce (Sauce aux Framboise)
keywords: dessert, frozen raspberries in syrup, sugar, raw
recipeIngredient: 2 packages, 10 ounces, frozen raspberries in syrup

recipeInstructions.text: Let the raspberries thaw partly. Put them through a sieve, pressing to extract as much liquid as possible. Discard the seeds. There should be about one and two-thirds cups of puree.
To the sauce add the sugar and stir to dissolve. Chill until ready to serve.
